column1: Never ascribe to malice, that which can be explained by incompetence - Napoleon
Quidquid latine dictum sit, altum sonatur - Whatever is said in Latin sounds profound.
I don't need to test my programs. I have an error-correcting modem - Om I. Baud
Programming in Basic causes brain damage - Edsger Wybe Dijkstra
If you give someone a program
column2: you will frustrate them for a day; if you teach them how to program
column3: you will frustrate them for a lifetime.
